channel.title: S3 and Replication :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: PHASE 1: STORAGE PREPARATION (S3 & REPLICATION) This phase focuses on creating a durable storage layer for frontend resources and setting up an automated cross-region synchronization mechanism. Step 1.1: Create the Primary Bucket (Singapore) Open the Amazon S3 Console and select the Asia Pacific (Singapore) region. Click Create bucket. Bucket name: sgutodolist-frontend-sg Object Ownership: ACLs disabled (Recommended) Block Public Access: ✅ Block all public access (The bucket must remain private because CloudFront OAC will be used.) Bucket Versioning: ✅ Enable (Required for cross-region replication.) Default encryption: Server-side encryption with Amazon S3 managed keys (SSE-S3) Click Create bucket.
